title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Week 4 Reaction: Bills-Ravens, Patriots-Packers, Seahawks-Lions, Broncos loss
itunes:title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Week 4 Reaction: Bills-Ravens, Patriots-Packers, Seahawks-Lions, Broncos loss
description:
Richard Sherman reacts to Week 4 in the NFL. How does he feel about John Harbaugh not kicking a field goal in the Baltimore Ravens' loss to Josh Allen and the Buffalo Bills? You will want to hear Richard's take on Pete Carroll and the Seahawks' win and Russell Wilson and the Denver Broncos' loss to the Las Vegas Raiders. Are the Philadelphia Eagles the best team in the NFL after their win over the Jacksonville Jaguars? The Packers survive over Bill Belichick's New England Patriots and Richard gives the perfect analogy of how Aaron Rodgers is feeling about his young receivers. #volume #herd #colincowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
